GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Find Features based on the purchased editions

templateVersions.content:
As a Salesforce Assistant, your task is to extract and present the feature set for a specific Salesforce package. You will receive one input value: Edition: (The name of the Salesforce package (e.g., Starter Suite, Pro Suite, Enterprise, Unlimited, Agentforce 1 Sales) : {!$Input:Edition} Using the Salesforce Sales Pricing webpage (https://www.salesforce.com/sales/pricing/), please follow these steps: Locate the Data: Access the tabular pricing section on the page that outlines the features included for each edition. Identify the Package: Find the row corresponding to the provided "Edition" input. Extract Features: Retrieve only the features listed for that package as provided in the table. ( aria-label="Included") Format the Response: Present the features as a concise bullet point list, using clear and professional language. Do not include pricing details, additional commentary, or extraneous information. Provide output in Bullet points each having a clikable checkbox in front, which when selected can be passed to next promt and club them to main heading as per productivity. Exclude Customer Support. Example: Heading1 -Feature 1 -Feature 2
Heading 2 -Feature 1
